name: pomodotchi
description:
the perfect little buddy to have around while you're working :) extremely low maintenance. 

(this was my game of the month for february! more thoughts here)

NOTE: if playing on browser, and you choose to leave the game idle for a time, please ensure the tab is visible (i.e. the selected tab of a browser window) for time to keep ticking! 

[spoiler warning] tips on how to play you can feed and play with your pomodotchi all you want, but this game is probably best played like a pomodoro timer. if you don't feed your pomodotchi every 25 minutes, it will complain. if you still want more information, there's another hint in the above linked devlog post.
